[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.TokenHolder/TokenHolderContract.cs] [Function: RemoveBeneficiary()] [Logic Error] Line 85 checks 'lockedAmount > input.Amount' - what happens when lockedAmount == input.Amount? Beneficiary is removed but should they be? (Medium)

[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.TokenHolder/TokenHolderContract.cs] [Function: RemoveBeneficiary()] [Race Condition] Can a beneficiary front-run RemoveBeneficiary by calling ClaimProfits, and then the RemoveBeneficiary fails due to missing details? (Medium)
